sqlMap.select: select m3.t_id as "id", m3.t_name as "text", m3.t_url as "href", m3.t_pid as "pid" from t_menus m3 right join ( select distinct t_menu_id from t_r_m_mid m1 right join (select t_role_id from t_u_r_midss where t_user_id = #userID#) m2 on m1.t_role_id = m2.t_role_id) m4 on m3.t_id = m4.t_menu_id where m3.t_pid = #pid# order by m3.t_id
sqlMap.insert: insert into t_r_m_mid (t_id, t_role_id, t_menu_id) values (t_r_m_mid_seq.nextval, #roleID#, #menuID#)
sqlMap.select: select u2.* from ( select u1.*, rownum as rm from ( select t_roleId as "roleID", t_roleName as "roleName", t_desc as "roleDesc" from t_roless r ) u1 where rownum <= #endPos# ) u2 where u2.rm >= #startPos#

select m.t_id as "id", m.t_name as "name", m.t_url as "url", m.t_pid as "pid", m.t_type as "type", nvl2(m1.t_role_id, 1, 0) as "checked", m.t_parent as "isParent" from t_menus m left join (select m2.t_role_id, m2.t_menu_id from t_r_m_mid m2 where m2.t_role_id = #roleID#) m1 on m.t_id = m1.t_menu_id order by m.t_id
